name: Bugs Like Me
description:
Fun 2D Top Down Shooter, where you gets invaded by bugs, which is attracted by your spectacular glow.

Shoot them before they reach you and try to survive as long as you can and get a higher score than your friends.

Game Programming & Design by Martin Rohwedder

Music by Alexandre Chaigniau

Additional credits:

Crosshair icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Clock icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Trophy icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Start icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Bangers Google Font
